location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the commands of the Bombay Government dated 9 April 1811, which countermanded its commands issued 29 March 1811 to reduce the guard at the Bushire Residency; it further notes that the countermanded orders were never received at Bushire.
